org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern

接口 PatternConverter

    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractPatternConverter, AbstractStyleNameConverter, AbstractStyleNameConverter.Black, AbstractStyleNameConverter.Blue, AbstractStyleNameConverter.Cyan, AbstractStyleNameConverter.Green, AbstractStyleNameConverter.Magenta, AbstractStyleNameConverter.Red, AbstractStyleNameConverter.White, AbstractStyleNameConverter.Yellow, ClassNamePatternConverter, DatePatternConverter, EncodingPatternConverter, EqualsBaseReplacementConverter, EqualsIgnoreCaseReplacementConverter, EqualsReplacementConverter, ExtendedThrowablePatternConverter, FileLocationPatternConverter, FullLocationPatternConverter, HighlightConverter, IntegerPatternConverter, LevelPatternConverter, LineLocationPatternConverter, LineSeparatorPatternConverter, LiteralPatternConverter, LogEventPatternConverter, LoggerPatternConverter, MapPatternConverter, MarkerPatternConverter, MarkerSimpleNamePatternConverter, MaxLengthConverter, MdcPatternConverter, MessagePatternConverter, MethodLocationPatternConverter, NamePatternConverter, NanoTimePatternConverter, NdcPatternConverter, ProcessIdPatternConverter, RegexReplacementConverter, RelativeTimePatternConverter, RootThrowablePatternConverter, SequenceNumberPatternConverter, StyleConverter, ThreadIdPatternConverter, ThreadNamePatternConverter, ThreadPriorityPatternConverter, ThrowablePatternConverter, UuidPatternConverter, VariablesNotEmptyReplacementConverter

    public interface PatternConverter
    Interface that all PatternConverters must implement.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String CATEGORY
      Main plugin category for PatternConverter plugins.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void format(Object obj, StringBuilder toAppendTo)
      Formats an object into a string buffer.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the converter.
      String getStyleClass(Object e)
      This method returns the CSS style class that should be applied to the LoggingEvent passed as parameter, which can be null.

    • 字段详细资料

      • CATEGORY

        static final String CATEGORY
        Main plugin category for PatternConverter plugins.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.1
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • format

        void format(Object obj,
            StringBuilder toAppendTo)
        Formats an object into a string buffer.
        参数:
        obj - event to format, may not be null.
        toAppendTo - string buffer to which the formatted event will be appended. May not be null.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the converter.
        返回:
        The name of the converter.

      • getStyleClass

        String getStyleClass(Object e)
        This method returns the CSS style class that should be applied to the LoggingEvent passed as parameter, which can be null.
        参数:
        e - null values are accepted
        返回:
        the name of the conversion pattern
